title: How can I create my account at pbe?
body:
I want to create an account in the pbe but I do not know how, I need help to orient myself, could they help me?
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: The PBE application page is currently down for maintenance until further notice.  I don't have any eta on when it will be back up, but we have a[ PBE Status](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) up to stay up to date.  Hang tight!
